meanings.definition: A blow that renders an opponent unconscious.
meanings.sent1: The boxer delivered a powerful knockout to his opponent.
meanings.sent2: The knockout punch ended the fight instantly.
meanings.sent3: The knockout left the boxer snoring on the mat.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was a knockout, captivating everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The knockout in the movie was so realistic, it startled the viewers.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very attractive or impressive.
meanings.sent1: She was a knockout in her elegant evening gown.
meanings.sent2: The new sports car was a real knockout with its sleek design.
meanings.sent3: His knockout smile always brightened up her day.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was a knockout, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The knockout beauty of the garden took her breath away.

meanings.definition: The act of knocking someone out.
meanings.sent1: The knockout in the boxing match was swift and decisive.
meanings.sent2: The knockout in the street fight surprised everyone watching.
meanings.sent3: His knockout of the bully earned him respect from his classmates.
meanings.sent4: The knockout of the villain in the movie was the highlight of the film.
meanings.sent5: The knockout in the video game was the ultimate victory for the player.
